TABLE.NAME: block_elbp
TABLE.COMMENT: Default comment for block_elbp, please edit me

TABLE.NAME: lbp_settings
TABLE.COMMENT: Settings table

TABLE.NAME: lbp_plugins
TABLE.COMMENT: Table to store the list of plugins

FIELD.NAME: title
FIELD.COMMENT: The display title of the plugin

FIELD.NAME: path
FIELD.COMMENT: path to plugin

TABLE.NAME: lbp_plugin_groups
TABLE.COMMENT: The groupings of plugins into tabs

TABLE.NAME: lbp_tutor_assignments
TABLE.COMMENT: Table of assignments for personal tutors - to individual students or to whole courses

FIELD.NAME: groupid
FIELD.COMMENT: May want to assign a tutor to only a specific group of students within a course

FIELD.NAME: lastupdated
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp for the last time this assignment was updated. This could be used in custom cron scripts to update a tutor/course assignment and add/remove students who have joined/left the course.

TABLE.NAME: lbp_student_profile
TABLE.COMMENT: Table for student profile info.

TABLE.NAME: lbp_att_punc
TABLE.COMMENT: Table for attendance and Punctuality (and anything else they want to store similarly)

FIELD.NAME: courseid
FIELD.COMMENT: (optional) course Id to store it against

FIELD.NAME: type
FIELD.COMMENT: ATT PUNC etc...

FIELD.NAME: period
FIELD.COMMENT: (optional) Can store against whatever period they want, e.g. "7 Days", "28 Days", "Term 1", "Term 2", etc... It's just a string field.

TABLE.NAME: lbp_mis_connections
TABLE.COMMENT: Table to store MIS connections

FIELD.NAME: host
FIELD.COMMENT: This could also be a data source, depending on the type of connection

FIELD.NAME: db
FIELD.COMMENT: database name

TABLE.NAME: lbp_plugin_mis
TABLE.COMMENT: Linking plugins to MIS connections, with names so that you can call a plugin connection by name and it return a value fromspecific SQL

FIELD.NAME: misid
FIELD.COMMENT: id of mis_connection record

TABLE.NAME: lbp_targets
TABLE.COMMENT: Default comment for the table, please edit me

TABLE.NAME: lbp_target_attributes
TABLE.COMMENT: Default comment for the table, please edit me

TABLE.NAME: lbp_target_status
TABLE.COMMENT: Default comment for the table, please edit me

FIELD.NAME: ignored
FIELD.COMMENT: Ignore targets of this status in things like deadline passed events

FIELD.NAME: listinsummary
FIELD.COMMENT: List these targets in the summary box

TABLE.NAME: lbp_target_comments
TABLE.COMMENT: Default comment for the table, please edit me

FIELD.NAME: parent
FIELD.COMMENT: Parent ID of comment, allowing threaded comments

TABLE.NAME: lbp_tutorials
TABLE.COMMENT: Tutorial table

FIELD.NAME: tutorialdate
FIELD.COMMENT: Unix timestamp

FIELD.NAME: settime
FIELD.COMMENT: Unix timestamp

FIELD.NAME: confidentialityid
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of a record in lbp_confidentiality table to define who has access to view this. NULL == GLOBAL

FIELD.NAME: del
FIELD.COMMENT: Is it deleted?

TABLE.NAME: lbp_tutorial_attributes
TABLE.COMMENT: Attributes for tutorials, e.g. comments, attendance, grades, targets, etc...

TABLE.NAME: lbp_confidentiality
TABLE.COMMENT: Confidentiality settings, e.g. GLOBAL, RESTRICTED, etc...

TABLE.NAME: lbp_plugin_hooks
TABLE.COMMENT: Plugin hooks

FIELD.NAME: hookid
FIELD.COMMENT: The ID of the lbp_hook record

TABLE.NAME: lbp_hooks
TABLE.COMMENT: List of available hooks

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: The name of the hook

TABLE.NAME: lbp_logs
TABLE.COMMENT: All logging goes here instead of Moodle logs

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: The user who performed the action

FIELD.NAME: module
FIELD.COMMENT: Which block or mod?

FIELD.NAME: element
FIELD.COMMENT: Which element of that module?

FIELD.NAME: action
FIELD.COMMENT: What action was performed?

FIELD.NAME: studentid
FIELD.COMMENT: If it was related to a student, what was their id?

FIELD.NAME: time
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of action

TABLE.NAME: lbp_log_attributes
TABLE.COMMENT: Log attributes, e.g. courseid, qualid, value, etc...

TABLE.NAME: lbp_attachments
TABLE.COMMENT: Attachments to student ELBPs

TABLE.NAME: lbp_attachment_comments
TABLE.COMMENT: Comments made to attachments

TABLE.NAME: lbp_course_reports
TABLE.COMMENT: Course Reports

TABLE.NAME: lbp_course_report_attributes
TABLE.COMMENT: Attributes for course reports

TABLE.NAME: lbp_review_questions
TABLE.COMMENT: Default comment for the table, please edit me

TABLE.NAME: lbp_review_question_values
TABLE.COMMENT: Default comment for the table, please edit me

TABLE.NAME: lbp_course_report_reviews
TABLE.COMMENT: Course report review question answers

TABLE.NAME: lbp_termly_creports
TABLE.COMMENT: Default comment for the table, please edit me

TABLE.NAME: lbp_termly_creport_reports
TABLE.COMMENT: Default comment for the table, please edit me

TABLE.NAME: lbp_comments
TABLE.COMMENT: Default comment for the table, please edit me

TABLE.NAME: lbp_comment_attributes
TABLE.COMMENT: Default comment for the table, please edit me

TABLE.NAME: lbp_add_sup_sessions
TABLE.COMMENT: Default comment for the table, please edit me

TABLE.NAME: lbp_add_sup_attributes
TABLE.COMMENT: Default comment for the table, please edit me

TABLE.NAME: lbp_add_sup_comments
TABLE.COMMENT: Default comment for the table, please edit me

TABLE.NAME: lbp_alert_events
TABLE.COMMENT: Table to store different events we can get alerts from

FIELD.NAME: auto
FIELD.COMMENT: The event is run automatically in the cron, not manually on the triggering of an event

TABLE.NAME: lbp_alerts
TABLE.COMMENT: Table to store what alerts users want

TABLE.NAME: lbp_alert_queue
TABLE.COMMENT: Queuing messages for dispatch

FIELD.NAME: historyid
FIELD.COMMENT: If set, it's the id of an lbp_alert_history row

TABLE.NAME: lbp_alert_attributes
TABLE.COMMENT: Custom values for alerts

TABLE.NAME: lbp_alert_history
TABLE.COMMENT: History of alerts sent so that we don't keeps ending same thing every night

TABLE.NAME: lbp_alert_history_attributes
TABLE.COMMENT: Attributes for alert history so we can check for identical records

TABLE.NAME: lbp_mis_mappings
TABLE.COMMENT: Mapping fields in plugin MIS connections

FIELD.NAME: pluginmisid
FIELD.COMMENT: Id of the lbp_plugin_mis record

FIELD.NAME: alias
FIELD.COMMENT: If the field has an alias. For example if you are contatinating fields together in the SELECT and need to use an alias to get the value off the DB object that is returned

TABLE.NAME: lbp_plugin_report_elements
TABLE.COMMENT: The elements we can use in the Dashboard reporting wizard

FIELD.NAME: getstringname
FIELD.COMMENT: The value to use in get_string to get the name of this element

TABLE.NAME: lbp_att_punc_history
TABLE.COMMENT: Default comment for the table, please edit me

TABLE.NAME: lbp_register
TABLE.COMMENT: Default comment for the table, please edit me

TABLE.NAME: lbp_register_events
TABLE.COMMENT: Default comment for the table, please edit me

FIELD.NAME: eventcode
FIELD.COMMENT: This is a unique code for the event from your mis system (assuming we are importing the data)

TABLE.NAME: lbp_termly_creport_atts
TABLE.COMMENT: Default comment for the table, please edit me

TABLE.NAME: lbp_challenges
TABLE.COMMENT: Default comment for the table, please edit me

TABLE.NAME: lbp_user_challenges
TABLE.COMMENT: Default comment for the table, please edit me

TABLE.NAME: lbp_custom_plugins
TABLE.COMMENT: Default comment for the table, please edit me

TABLE.NAME: lbp_custom_plugin_attributes
TABLE.COMMENT: Default comment for the table, please edit me

TABLE.NAME: lbp_custom_plugin_settings
TABLE.COMMENT: Default comment for the table, please edit me

TABLE.NAME: lbp_custom_plugin_items
TABLE.COMMENT: Default comment for the table, please edit me

TABLE.NAME: lbp_custom_plugin_permission
TABLE.COMMENT: Default comment for the table, please edit me

TABLE.NAME: lbp_custom_plugin_mis
TABLE.COMMENT: Default comment for the table, please edit me

TABLE.NAME: lbp_file_path_codes
TABLE.COMMENT: Default comment for the table, please edit me

TABLE.NAME: lbp_learning_styles
TABLE.COMMENT: Default comment for the table, please edit me

TABLE.NAME: lbp_user_learning_styles
TABLE.COMMENT: Default comment for the table, please edit me

TABLE.NAME: lbp_learning_style_questions
TABLE.COMMENT: Default comment for the table, please edit me

TABLE.NAME: lbp_learning_style_answers
TABLE.COMMENT: Default comment for the table, please edit me

TABLE.NAME: lbp_user_learn_style_answers
TABLE.COMMENT: Default comment for the table, please edit me

TABLE.NAME: lbp_learning_style_answer_pt
TABLE.COMMENT: Default comment for the table, please edit me

TABLE.NAME: lbp_user_capabilities
TABLE.COMMENT: Default comment for the table, please edit me

FIELD.NAME: value
FIELD.COMMENT: 0 = NO, 1 = YES

TABLE.NAME: lbp_target_sets
TABLE.COMMENT: Target grouping for ELBP

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: users id

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: name of target

TABLE.NAME: lbp_target_set_attributes
TABLE.COMMENT: Default comment for the table, please edit me
